title: "Starry Space Art"
content:
# Welcome to Starry Space Art!

Our website is dedicated to showcasing beautiful and captivating artwork inspired by the vast expanse of space. Our main feature is a vintage map of the stars and constellations, complete with detailed illustrations of spacecraft and celestial bodies.

But that's not all we have to offer! We also feature a wide variety of other space-themed art, including stunning photographs of galaxies, nebulas, and planets, as well as original paintings and digital art created by talented artists from around the world.

Whether you're a space enthusiast, an art lover, or just someone who appreciates the beauty of the cosmos, we're sure you'll find something to love on our site. So take a look around, and let yourself be transported to the far reaches of the universe through the power of art!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A vintage map of the stars and constellations, with detailed illustrations of spacecraft and celestial bodies."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
